CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 3, 1959, pg. A24 reads: "AME Women At Confab - Active during the sessions of the Pittsburgh Annual Conference were these outstanding AME women. Left to right: Mmes. E.C. Hatcher, wife of the Bishop; J.G. Harris, wife of the host pastor; Augustus C. Sumpter, wife of St. James pastor; Alma A. Polk, director of the Young People's Department of the AME CHurch; B.M. McLin, wife of Presiding Elder McLin; Wilhelmina pg. Lawrence of St. James AME Church, Cleveland, Ohio; V.C. Hodges, wife of the secretary of the American Bible Society, and Elsie Meeks, director of Young People of the Pittsburgh Conference.- Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Audience of men and women, including front row, from left: Mrs. E.C. Hatcher, Mrs. J.G. Harris, Mrs. Augustus C. Sumpter, Alma A. Polk, Mrs. B.M. McLin, Wilhelmina P. Lawrence, Mrs. V.C. Hodges, and Elsie Meeks, in Soldiers and Sailors Memorial Hall for AME annual conference
